Content.Text:
<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hmm? What're you up to, <MYNAME>? Are you
just dropping by for a visit?

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Me? I was about to make myself something to
eat. I've been so busy, I haven't had a chance to
eat anything at all yet today.
Want me to make it?
Make some for me, too!

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
What, really? Awesome! I'd love it if you would. I
can hardly wait to taste one of your home-
cooked meals, <MYNAME>!

<FACE_REGER><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
Wow. That's some pretty good form there.

<FACE_REGER><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
You know, I think this might be the first time I've
ever had someone special like you cook
something for me. I'm honored!

<FACE_REGER><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOSS>
All my old girlfriends were too afraid to present
their "amateur" cooking to a pro like me.
<PAGE>
...As if "amateur" cooking bothers me in the
slightest!
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>I mean, as long as it's not inedible, I'd never call
something made with care by someone I love
"amateur" in the first place.

<FACE_REGER><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
...Ah, but I'm making you nervous now, aren't I?
Sorry about that!
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>I'm honestly just over the moon knowing that
you're about to cook something for me.
<PAGE>
So no take-backs, okay?

<FACE_REGER><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Time to dig in!

<FACE_REGER><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
<WINDOW_PLEASANT_L>...Mmm! This is great! Even if I weren't already
biased, this is good enough to be on the menu
in my restaurant!

<FACE_REGER><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Man, you can do just about anything,
<MYNAME>, you know that? Maybe you should
quit farming and take up a job as a pro chef!

<FACE_REGER><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
...Ha ha! Don't worry, I'm just kidding!
<PAGE>
I know you love your farm and take lots of pride
in your work. I'd be shocked if you ever said
you'd really quit.
<PAGE>
<WINDOW_PALPITATION_L><FACE_LOVE>Though, uh, I have to admit the thought of
running a restaurant together with you someday
sounds...really nice.

<FACE_REGER><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
<WINDOW_PLEASANT_L>Yum! That was amazing. Thanks for making me
something so delicious, <MYNAME>. I hope
you'll cook for me again sometime!

<FACE_REGER><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
...Oh, <MYNAME>? Do you still have some time
to spare?
<PAGE>
I mean, it'd be a little sad to shoo you out the
door right after I'm done eating. What say we go
upstairs and chat for a bit?

<FACE_REGER><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
Cool. C'mon!

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Ha ha! Somebody decided to pounce on an
opportunity, I see. Sure! Sit down and wait just
a minute.

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hope you liked it. Though y'know, I'd be really
happy if you'd cook something for me sometime
too, <MYNAME>!
I could never do that!
Sure thing!

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Well, that was blunt. Why not? Are you worried
about what a pro chef might think of your
cooking?

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Well...I guess that makes sense. But it's really
not something you need to worry about.

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Anyway, I've got some work that needs to get
done. See you later, <MYNAME>!

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Can't do it, eh?
<PAGE>
I thought I was used to being told that, but
hearing it from you...kinda hurts...

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Really? You will?!

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Wow! See, none of my old girlfriends ever
cooked anything for me.
<PAGE>
Every time I asked, they'd make excuses and say
they were too shy to cook for a pro chef. So I'm
kind of surprised...but in a good way!
<PAGE>
<WINDOW_PLEASANT_R><FACE_LAUGH>I'll hold you to that, too, y'know. No backsies!
Man, I'm looking forward to it already...
